intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple hi satellite a ni a, artistic mission a nei a: outer space-a hriatrengna hmun, khawvela cheng emaw, awm tawh emaw, sentient being zawng zawng tan hawn a ni.
intro.paragraph2: Technology hmang hian tu pawhin Temple-ah mi hming an thawn thei a, chu chu mi boral tawh emaw, mi nung tak tak emaw, hriatreng tlak thil nung eng pawh emaw a ni thei.

sculpture.heading: A Sculpture chu a ni
sculpture.paragraph1: Artwork hian co-dependent element pathum a nei a: a bik takin hming maktaduai tam tak dahna tura siam satellite; satellite hmanga thu inthlengna vantlang lem; leh website hmanga telte’n hmingte, tun atanga an boral thlenga vanram an thawn theihna tur website a ni bawk.
sculpture.paragraph2: Multidisciplinary endeavor angin Orbital Temple hi site-specific sculpture, inhabiting space anga ngaih theih a ni. Artsat project a ni bawk.

antenna.heading: Antenna Hi Mipui Lemziak A Ni
antenna.paragraph1: Outer space nena min thlunzawmtu antenna.
antenna.paragraph2: Orbital satellite nena direct-a inbiakpawhna nei thei tur antenna siam mek a ni.
antenna.paragraph3: Rangkachak reflective surface, a chunga van lam hawia lang, mass stimulation (or ‘up there’ nena kan inzawmna) bul tanna a ni.
antenna.paragraph4: Khawvel hmun tam zawkah sculpture te hi dah a nih loh laiin, tuna satellite control mektu kan Frames from Earth te hian passthrough tinah hming te hi an thawn chhuak zel a ni.
antenna.paragraph5: He vision hi i khawpuiah rawn thlen pui rawh—space exploration, art, leh cosmos-a kan hmun insem chungchang sawihona tichaktu antenna sculpture dah rawh. Project thlawp dan tur hi zir belh rawh .

imageAlts.satellite: Orbital Temple Satellite hmanga siam a ni
imageAlts.riseNy: Rise NY-a Orbital Temple-ah hian a awm a
imageAlts.installation: Orbital Temple chu Clara Marques-i siam a ni
imageAlts.antenna: Orbital Temple Antenna hmanga siam a ni

imageCaptions.riseNy: Thlawhna hmuna Orbital Temple awm. RiseNY&Partners siam 3D rendering a ni.
imageCaptions.mercosul:
Mercosul Biennial-ah Orbital Temple dah a ni a, hei hi Brazil khawpui Porto Alegre-ah a ni.
Thlalak hi Clara Marques kutchhuak a ni.
